title: Assistance needed to change back to legacy client
body:
I don't like the new client so want to change back to the old one. One the first few days after updating the new client, I could change back to the old one by clicking the "launch legacy client" and the legacy client will pop up. But recently when I click it again, it just closes the client and the legacy client won't appear, I have tried many times and doesn't work.

 I've also changed the user.cfg to "leagueClientOptIn = no", but it still pops up with the new client everytime I open. 

Please help me out here!

replies.body:
Try this:

1. Right click on your League of Legends desktop icon and select _"Open file location"_.

2. That should have opened up a new window. Scroll down until you find _"lol.laucher.admin"_ and open it.

That should have opened the legacy client. If it didn't work or you've already tried this, let me know and I'll send a Wrenchmen your way ;)

are we being forced to use the new client? atm i just access legacy through the bottom right of the current login, i find new client has created slower fps rates for me and much more annoying and less friendly interface to use with clubs and profiles. 

Can players elect to keep old client if they wish?

You will be forced to use it once the [open beta ends](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/230175788-Updated-Client-Open-Beta-FAQ#h1q6) in early 2017. But until then you can use the old client as much as you wish.

Keep in mind though, the client is still in beta, so it's not optimised for everyone yet. In a few months it should start running really smoothly for everyone.
I HATE THE NEW CLIENT! please bring back old one
i mean, you may as well get used to the new one friend. The old one will stop being supported when next season starts.
